articles.description: “As complicated and conflicting as posthumous releases can be I feel I’ll hold this one in a special place,” X’s collaborator John Cunningham says of Lil Uzi Vert-featuring track…
articles.content:
The estate ofXXXTentacion marked the five-year anniversary of the rapper’s death Sunday with the official release of “I’m Not Human,” featuring Lil Uzi Vert.
The acoustic ballad was previously tease… [+2347 chars]

articles.title: How Extraction 2’s director went hands-on for his 21-minute action shot - Polygon
articles.description: Sam Hargrave shot Extraction 2’s big one-take action shot camera himself, to keep everyone else safe — and got blown off a train. He explains why:
